metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15922 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In GNU Libextractor 1.4, there is an out-of-bounds read in the EXTRACTOR_dvi_extract_method function in plugins/dvi_extractor.c. It was discovered that Libextractore incorrectly handled certain crafted files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libextractor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
